1963556ee3a72919.summary: We’ve updated our Community Guidelines, effective April 20, 2025, to foster a safer and more inclusive environment on our platform. These changesreflect feedback from our users and our commitment to responsible engagement.

196355686d03529f.summary: We’re writing to inform you of updates to our Subscription Terms. These changes aim to enhance clarity, protect our community, and improve your experience on our platform.

1963555ba3863c38.summary: A suite of new features will be rolling out to our App Store in the coming weeks. You can now fine-tune recommendations for apps and games based on your interests. A new Privacy Dashboard lets you manage what data is used
